title: Adoption Equality For Children Of Same-Sex Couples (Premier of Victoria)
text: ( Source : Premier of Victoria ) The Andrews Labor Government will this week introduce a bill to remove discrimination against the children of same-sex couples from Victorian adoption laws. Currently , same-sex couples are not able to adopt in
